function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of support for digital transformation processes","Impact":"Inability to adapt to digital tools and processes, hindering survival and relaunch of activities","Mitigation":"Investment in digital training and access to technological tools","Technologies":"Digital training platforms, collaboration tools, project management software","People":"SMEs, employees","Owner":"Government, industry associations"},{"Description":"Inadequate integration of spatially blind policies and local ones","Impact":"Inefficiency in supporting local innovation ecosystems and economic actors","Mitigation":"Integration of policies to support both spatially blind and local initiatives","Technologies":"Data analytics for local demand analysis, policy integration platforms","People":"Local government, economic actors, SMEs","Owner":"Policy makers, local government"},{"Description":"Lack of integration between real estate interests and social value in urban regeneration processes","Impact":"Failure to support social infrastructure and community economy","Mitigation":"Enhanced mediation and collaboration between real estate interests and social value production","Technologies":"Urban planning software, community engagement platforms","People":"Urban developers, real estate stakeholders, social organizations","Owner":"Urban planning authorities"}]}
